con:request.name: ProcessCard - Sale 1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ProcessCard>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardExpirationDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits>\r <acr1:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr1:CustomerCode>\r <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MagneticData>${MagneticData}</acr1:MagneticData>\r <acr1:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr1:NameOnCard>\r <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TerminalCapabilities>Manual</acr1:TerminalCapabilities>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ProcessCard>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request:
\r \r \r \r \r ${MerchantId}\r ${Password}\r ${UserId}\r \r \r ${Amount}\r \r \r ${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}\r \r ${CardCVV}\r \r ${CurrencyCode}\r \r \r ${CustomerCode}\r ${CustomerEmail}\r \r \r \r 59
${AmountTip}${UserId}]]> ${InvoiceNumber}\r \r ${MagneticData}\r ${NameOnCard}\r \r ${PONumber}\r \r \r Manual\r Sale\r \r \r \r

con:request.name: ProcessCard - Void (Sale 1)

con:request.name: ProcessCard - Auth 4 (Restaurant)
con:request.con:request:
\r \r \r \r \r ${MerchantId}\r ${Password}\r ${UserId}\r \r \r ${Amount}\r \r \r ${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}\r \r ${CardCVV}\r \r ${CurrencyCode}\r \r \r ${CustomerCode}\r ${CustomerEmail}\r \r \r \r 59
${AmountTip}${UserId}]]> ${InvoiceNumber}\r \r ${MagneticData}\r ${NameOnCard}\r \r ${PONumber}\r \r \r Manual\r Auth\r \r \r \r

con:request.name: ProcessCard - Force (Auth 1)
